resources.string: This is the device which is in front of you
TimeLimit can use the Internet to prevent a manipulation by modifying the system clock. For this, a request to the TimeLimit server is sent.
Disable and use the system time
Use if possible, otherwise use the local clock
Use always, otherwise block when limited categories are used
TimeLimit uses the permission for the usage stats access. This is only used to detect the currently used App.

TimeLimit uses the notification access to block notifications of blocked apps. Notifications and their contents are not saved. Additionally, this is used to detect and block background music playback.
Enabling drawing on top of other Apps can improve blocking in some cases. Moreover, this is one way to allow TimeLimit at newer Android versions to open the lockscreen.

This is used to \"press\" the home button before showing the lock screen. This fixes blocking in some cases. Moreover, this is one way to allow TimeLimit at newer Android versions to open the lockscreen.
The device admin permission was not granted. TimeLimit can be stopped at any time using the system settings.

The device admin permission was granted. This must be disabled before TimeLimit can be uninstalled or stopped using the system settings. This permission can be disabled without the password of the parents.

The device admin permission with the possibility to lock the system after an manipulation was granted. This must be disabled before TimeLimit can be uninstalled or stopped using the system settings. If you have locked out yourself, consult the support.
The device owner permission was granted and prevents disabling and uninstalling TimeLimit. This permission can only be disabled by TimeLimit/ a parent which uninstalls TimeLimit.
Touch this option to open the corresponding section of the system settings
Open the screen at the other device to modify the permissions
